sentences.en: Harry's personal credo is doing the best he can.
sentences.cn: 哈利的个人信条是尽自己所能。

sentences.en: The credo of the conference is: "No talks. No keynotes.
sentences.cn: 本次大会的信条是：“没有空谈、没有演讲，只有编码！”

sentences.en: Yet their credo of anti-nationalism carries risks too.
sentences.cn: 但是，他们反民族主义也给他们带来了风险。
